otherNames: Lang Huan Library , Jade World Academy,  Lang Huan Academy, 琅寰书院
synopsis: In the Xuan Hai Tian cultivation world, where powerful sects stand tall, modern day Yang Rui accidentally becomes the Dean of the divine Lang Huan Library. Yang Rui sets out to recruit new disciples and do something remarkable. Can Yang Rui glorify the name of the Lang Huan library?
